item.title: Day Out
item.description: Today I went to Windermere with my other cousins Scarlet and Ivy. I went to a field with Scarlet and Ivy, also I had ice cream.

item.title: Cupcakes recipe
item.description: Today I made cupcakes.

item.title: Sunday, 7th June 2020
item.description: If I was in charge of the world I would beat the Coronavirus. I would make sure everyone got to the hospital. I would make sure people do not litter and everyone had food and a home.

item.title: The Magic Wand
item.description: Once, I had a magic wand, of it I was so very proud. First I saw a bog, Bang! It turned into a dog. Next, I saw a hat, Boom! It turned into a cat. Next, I saw a pen, Whoosh! It turned into a hen. Last, I saw a horrid house, Crash! It turned into a mouse.

item.title: Tuesday, 2nd June 2020
item.description: Today I went for a bike ride and I did some Maths and English. I played a game with my brother Joel. I had to do a spelling test before lunch.

item.title: Tuesday, 26th May 2020
item.description: Pumpkin boy When he gets sad he turns into a pumpkin and explodes. He can shoot super charged pumpkins. He can turn fake pumpkins into real. He can calm pumpkins down. Ninja

item.title: Monday, 18th May 2020
item.description: Today I went for a bike ride and a walk. I also did some maths, English and colouring. Yesterday I played Fortnite and I got to level 79. Then I had tea with my family. I had fish fingers for tea. I also got to talk to my friend Lucas. I got v-bucks and I spent it on a skin in Fortnite what‚Äôs called pander team leader.

item.title: Candyland
item.description: Once there was a doughnut called Officer Doughnut. He lived in a candy house with an ice cream. He lived on a candy planet to. He wanted a candy city. So he said “I need to build a candy city”. So he built and built and built until he finally finished. He got some friends to live with him too. BUT SOMEONE BROKE IT. So they investigated who could that be.

item.title: Thursday, 7th May 2020
item.description: Today I practised riding on my bike. Yesterday I baked cupcakes. I made a blanket fort. I also played on my iPad in the blanket fort. I watched teen titans with my brother.

item.title: Wednesday, 22nd April 2020
item.description: Today I carried on with my Edward Jenner work from yesterday. The timeline. I then had to draw a poster from my book

item.title: Edward Jenner
item.description: On May 14, 1796 Edward Jenner took fluid from a cowpox blister and scratched it onto the skin of James Phipps, an eight year old. A single blister rose up on the spot, but James soon recovered. On July 1, Edward Jenner inoculated the boy again. This time with smallpox matter and no disease developed. The vaccine was a success.

item.title: Sunday, 19th April 2020
item.description: Water Boy can make a toxic water ball. Water Boy is powerful under water. Water Boy can make an ultra Tsunami. Water Boy has blue eyes, and has a pet.

item.title: Tuesday, 14th April 2020
item.description: On Tuesday I made my bed and I got ready in peace. I went for a walk. I did some school work.

item.title: Monday, 13th April 2020
item.description: On Monday I played with my brother Joel on my iPad. Yesterday I went for an Easter egg hunt and I ate some chocolate. I created an Easter basket for the Easter eggs. I got an app called Simple Piano.

item.title: Saturday, 11th April 2020
item.description: On Saturday I made my bed, got dressed in nice clothes. I read my book, Dog Man, with my Daddy. I did my piano and played on my iPad. I had my lunch outside, then did some Maths.

item.title: Thursday, 2nd April 2020
item.description: Rainbow Girl and Boy go to the same school. Rainbow Boy does not like Rainbow Girl.

item.title: Wednesday, 1st April 2020
item.description: I feel normal and calm. I organised my Pokemon cards. Later I’m getting Pokemon cards. I feel excited for my Pokemon cards.

item.title: Tuesday, 31st March 2020
item.description: Water Boy Water Boy can make a water tornado. Water Boy make a sticky tsunami. Water Boy is very powerful. Water Boy can teleport anywhere. Ice Boy Ice Boy is evil and he has red eyes He is evil because he does not like Water Boy

item.title: Saturday, 28th March 2020
item.description: Yesterday I watched Peter Rabbit and for tea I had pasta, garlic bread, and salad. Today I tidied my garden. I hoovered the grass and swept the leaves up. For lunch, I had beans on toast. I went for a walk and I organised my Pokemon cards.

item.title: Thursday, 26th March 2020
item.description: I played swing ball with Joel outside in the garden. I made up a superhero called Water Boy. He can make a massive tsunami and shoot water balls. I made my own breakfast.

item.title: Wednesday, 25th March 2020
item.description: Today I played Pokemon. I made my own breakfast. I feel nice, proud, and strong. I am excited for my walk later with my family.

item.title: Tuesday, 24th March 2020
item.description: On Tuesday I did Scratch and I played football with my brother Joel. I cooked an omelette at lunch time. Then I wrote the recipe down. I did Piano, Maths, and English. I feel calm and happy. I feel peaceful.

item.title: Monday, 23rd March 2020
item.description: On my birthday I went to school. I had biscuits in the afternoon. I went on my bike on Sunday with my family. On Monday I played football with my brother Joel. I did Joe Wicks. I cooked an omelette at lunch time. Then I wrote the recipe down. I did Piano, Maths and English. I feel calm and happy.
